documents.document: Jesse Sheehan plays live on The Weekend on @radionz 11.45 today! He'll be joining the awesome line-up at @CoastellaNZ on Feb 25!
Wairoa: quite possibly the most fascinating (bizarre) place I've visited in a while.
@debdebfish Sometimes forget how lucky I am to work on such awesome & creative projects! Holidays & down time help maintain perspective.
I finished 2016 stressed & overwhelmed with all the work I have on. Now I begin 2017 excited, stoked & grateful for all the work I have on!
@fastercamels @utherlives I am so shocked & saddened by this news. One of the finest people I have ever had the privilege to work with.
Holiday auto-response on, now off to buy a speargun! Holidaaaay!! ðŸ˜ƒ
Warren Maxwell shares Antarctic sounds & chats about @CoastellaNZ, 12.15 today on RNZ Standing Room Only - https://t.co/YL1j3i3zQj
@Karahdactyl The Met Shop used to be excellent but now they're online only.
@Karahdactyl It's totally a thing. But also lots of great options that don't reinforce such stereotypes. Good luck! x
On now on @RNZConcert, Eva Radich talks to Mark Amery from Letting Space about Common Ground Festival - programme launch tonight #RNZupbeat
@clementine_ford Haha, just using your Twitter name has invited comments from Trump supporters, which I find fascinating. Love your work!
If you missed it - @Clementine_Ford & @wallacechapman on RNZ this morning: the fight is just beginning! #YesAllWomen https://t.co/87FyuCFbej
@MasseyHumSocSci Thanks for putting on #Arts21 - such a critical conversation, great to take part!
It's important we can recognise the humanity of others, even those we don't agree with. Respect a differing argument. -Brian Crump #Arts21
Arts educated nurture and empower people to create a genuinely better world. @SteveMaharey #Arts21
They can express themselves - they can teach & persuade. And they want to explain a truth deeply and completely. @SteveMaharey #Arts21
Most important qualities gained from an arts degree: the ability to listen and to hear. #arts21
@jjprojects Not so local for you but come to Wgtn in Feb to see Photival - Photo Fest about our world on the Brink - https://t.co/2Fn0siz8ec
I was kind of enjoying our new-look #eqnz bookshelf. Until it finally collapsed. https://t.co/ejhPPBT0J7
Rime of the Modern Mariner at @BATS_Theatre had some ace design. Disappointed it didn't pass the Bechdel Test though. Especially this week.
@DannyFandango So sad. I've been drinking Jinzu negronis to ease the pain.
@jjprojects @wallacelchapman I hate that this is true. My Dad amongst. There isn't a well-reasoned article that can convince a mind made up.
Florida as well?! I feel sick.
Please remember Rule Number 6: don't take yourself so g--damn seriously. Wise words from Benjamin Zander.
"Where there is artistic excellence there is human dignity." Claire Robinson, PVC at @cocamassey. Congrats to all the students in Exposure!
11.30 today on @RadioActivefm - Duncan talks to Gerry Paul about COASTELLA Music Festival - get the line-up, and the low-down!
About to do our last show of #GujiGuji for the year and there's a family of ducklings outside our window at The Suter!
@tomas_ford 11am show & let you know :)
@tomas_ford Awesome! We're sold out for both shows tomorrow but will check for Tuesday
@tomas_ford Has he seen Bookbinder? That he will surely enjoy
@tomas_ford We pitch it for 2-8yrs, but the other puppeteer's 10yo still digs it... I can likely arrange comps if he's keen to try it
@tomas_ford Sounds great! I'm on the same NZ mobile # (or Twitter). Show is Guji Guji - on 10am & 11.30 all week, let me know if keen to see
@tomas_ford Hola! I am here! For the week, Awesome Arts-ing. You're in town? (Not off touring?)
Super inspired by the work Courtney Botfield is doing with #GoodshipAgency - 'doing good is good business'. Agree 100%! #BigScreen16
Language creates the future. Stories create the future. - Heather Rae #BigScreen16
"Things are starting to unhinge in a way that it's not going to be the same for anyone on this planet." ~Heather Rae opening #BigScreen16
"I don't write small parts. If you're in one of my play's you've got a lot to do." -Roger Hall
Tune into Upbeat on @radionz at 1.20pm to hear Roger Hall chat to Eva Radich about LAST LEGS, opening tomorrow night at @CircaTheatre!
"He's an equal opportunity leg-puller, everybody gets mocked in a Roger Hall play". LAST LEGS at @CircaTheatre. https://t.co/5XwVcAYBK7
Thanks @nuchigusuifest for having us! All the team from @littledogbarkin had a wonderful time in Japan! Now, homeward bound! #gujigujiontour
Eating soba surrounded by the sounds of happy slurping. #ilovejapan
I was checked in at the airport today by Mr Miyagi. Actually! #ilovejapan #gujigujiontour
LEO by Y2D Productions in #riccariccafesta was a playful & gravity-defying show of whimsy. Full of surprises! Loved it.
Wasabi flavoured everything? Yes please! #ilovejapan
Out for a late night run to avoid Okinawa heat & came across a park with late night drummers and I-go players! #ilovejapan #thisfishwillrun
GABEZ Show in Okinawa #riccariccafesta is a pure energy hit of dance, clowning & physical genius! Kids loved it & adults just as much! 5ðŸŒŸ
I'm sadly out of town for @nzff this year, but if I weren't I'd definitely be booking fast to see #ChronoMovie - love, sex & time travel!
While the men were eating KFC... #GujiGujiontour https://t.co/xYNYx10Ina
I just discovered The Generosity Journal filled with creative, generous & inspiring people! Nice work @OnePercentNZ! https://t.co/52koUQ2IWO
I feel I should take any part of a script I've been asked to work on written in Comic Sans as an immediate red flag...
Love this ghostly sea creature made out of milk bottles, as part of Mother Daughter Reef. #lightnelson https://t.co/KhOUaIPAK3
Talking about our works, #sunscales and #kereruinstallation, in @Light_Nelson at 1pm today! Wahoo! https://t.co/3DKwctQpv6
"It's a whale! A fish! A Mako shark! A dolphin! A porpoise!" Seems Scales of Sunlight is a successfully ambiguous sea creature. #sunscales
@charliehayes Thanks Charlotte, I did. They seemed oblivious to the oversight.
@VictorianPurple Of course. While smiling sweetly & listening politely as the men talk about their art.
@simonmarling Thanks Simon, no doubt we will :)
@VictorianPurple I know, right... kinda bummed. Pretty sure I did all the welding.
Somewhat tarnished by our artalk being referred to as by 'David Goldthorpe and his partner'. The nameless partner, eh. #everydaysexism #rpt
Not even 1 day in #Nelsonnz & I have fallen instantly in love with this place! Helped by finding our NEW PEPE!! #scooterlife
Very lucky to see dress of DUST PILGRIM this eve & it's magical, physical & truly wonderful! Would expect nothing less from @redleaptheatre
11.30 this morn on @RadioActivefm - @tomas_ford chats about his #CrapMusicRaveParty currently touring NZ, hitting #Wellington next weekend!
"Art is an essential part of human existence; the language of all humanity." YES!! La Casa Azul at @CircaTheatre: stunning! #CircaLovesFrida
I want my country back https://t.co/8H0nr0bsHe
"That's how you know you've had a really good night - those regrets." @tomas_ford on his 'Cringe Theatre' #CrapMusicRaveParty.
Just got out of the @RadioLIVENZ studio with @tomas_ford - gearing up for TONIGHT's first show of the #CrapMusicRaveParty NZ tour. It's on!
Today at 2.06 on @radionz, @tomas_ford shares some of his favourite laughable tracks on Standing Room Only. #CrapMusicRaveParty
"To be truly successful & happy, never work with anyone who gives you a headache or a stomachache." ~Jane Applegate #wisewords
Wahoo! Flights booked for @Light_Nelson - just over 3 weeks to go! Can't wait to share #sunscales and #kereruinstallation :)
Shot Bro by Rob Mokaraka was an exceptionally beautiful & moving piece of theatre. Shines a light on the darkness. Thank-you @KiaMauFestival
Second Negroni of #NegroniWeek is from The Bresolin raising money for Aro Valley Community Centre. Made with @Lighthousegin. #gingrin
First show of Little Kowhai Tree this morn with @littledogbarkin. Will my piano accordion skills pass? Little critics will soon be the judge
Enjoyed my first negroni of #NegroniWeek from @BlkSparrowWGTN - made with one of my favourites, @roguesocietygin. Good start to the week.
Some great NZ films in cinemas currently! Tickled, Great Maiden's Blush & Notes to Eternity all excellent #nzfilm https://t.co/hd88lCtURs
It's time to call on UN leaders to end the suffering in Syria. https://t.co/1BuCSacG7y #globalcitizen
Sarah Cordery talks to Wallace Chapman about her doco feature @notestoeternity - a meditation on Israel/Palestine, 11.30 today on @RNZSunday
Releasing TOMORROW! Get amongst. RT @filmyweek: Movie Review: Notes to Eternity - https://t.co/zFBR4FSKz1 #MovieReview
Enjoying a night in Paikakariki with the @Shakeemondown crew. The piano accordion/ vocalist is rocking it! Takin' us back to New Orleans!!
It's a four-show kinda day with @littledogbarkin. Bring it on.
Loved @davidfarrier's #ticklemovie - so much to giggle at & artfully made. Thanks @autumnevents for screening.
Great to be back at @BATS_Theatre with @LittleDogBarkin's #GujiGuji. First show done & the kids loved it!
Finally back running after the failed marathon in Jan. Gentle 12km round the Bays and feelin good! #runwgtn #thisfishwillrun
Children streaming into @MTGHawkesBay Theatre for our first performance of @littledogbarkin 's Guji Guji! Here we go! #itbegins
Saturday night poker with beautiful @stagetrick Devil's Half Acre playing cards. Love your work @_edwatson! https://t.co/3IXd9qhr5A
Jekyll & Hyde "was the most fun I have ever had at the theatre," says Madeleine Empson of Regional News #whoishyde https://t.co/bhc9FJpOVC
Leo Gene Peters from @isolatedog on @radionz today discussing his new & playful take on Jekyll & Hyde. #WhoIsHyde https://t.co/szegtfwnG2
Opening audience safe in their houses... Great opening night at @CircaTheatre! #whoishyde https://t.co/QfGd86KMnf
"The arts invite us to view our fellow human beings with generosity and curiosity" -Ben Cameron on @TEDTalks #nzarts https://t.co/Nv5YRlvnj9
Leo Gene Peters & Jono Price from @isolatedog chat on @RadioActivefm, 12pm about Jekyll&Hyde - opening next week at @CircaTheatre #WhoIsHyde
We are over the moon to be heading to @Light_Nelson in July with #SunScales and #KereruInstallation! #SolarPoweredArt
.@sameenazehra 's #HomicidalPacifist hits the mark - so relevant & will legit make you LOL. Tonight & tomoro only at @vkscomedy @NZFringe
@amelia_taverner @BingeCulture @NZFringe I was all slowmo sweaty from my slowmo run!
Currently slow walking & slow tweeting for @BingeCulture's Slow Lane in @NZFringe #fringe #aintgonnarush
UK comedian Sameena Zehra has arrived in #Wellington & chats about her @NZFringe show Homicidal Pacifist, 11.30 today on @RadioActivefm
Drinking a negroni at Rogue Society #gin bar, next to #KereruInstallation. Couldn't have planned it better. #Splore https://t.co/XOD6vjttmt
Kereru getting hoisted into the sky with the help of talented @Splore arborists. She flies! #kereruinstallation
Cat collars: before & after. #KereruInstallation - this weekend at @Splore! https://t.co/WMZ9acDtLF
Lauren Gibson & Simon Leary on @RadioActivefm 10.30 this morning talk about The ACB With Honora Lee, on soon at @CircaTheatre #acbhonoralee
Feathers! #KereruInstallation making progress... Slowly. We're coming at you @Splore! https://t.co/VPK2chAphW
Tune in to Upbeat, 1.30 today on @radionz - Kate De Goldi & Jane Waddell chat to Eva Radich about The ACB With Honora Lee at @CircaTheatre
Superman by Nathan Sawaya at the #ArtoftheBrick exhibition at @maasmuseum. Serious LEGO game, super impressive! https://t.co/2qOpju6mB8
